thread.title: Two fatal attacks in Cameroon
thread.title_full: Two fatal attacks in Cameroon | News24

author: news24.com
title: Two fatal attacks in Cameroon
text:
Yaound - At least 30 people were killed in the far north of Cameroon on Thursday in two successive suicide attacks, military and police sources said.
The first bombing took place shortly before noon in the marketplace of Kerawa, a city on the border with Nigeria, said the sources, speaking on condition of anonymity.
It was followed by a second attack about 200m from a military camp, said a police officer who asked not to be identified.
At least 30 people were killed, the sources said.
